title: Horizon Fitness TR01

params.label: Cushioning:
params.value: Variable Response Cushioning + adjustable air cushioning system

description: The Horizon T-R01 Folding Treadmill 2.2mm belt covers a running area of 42 x 120 cm. It’s powered by a 1.5 HP Johnson Drive System, and features a Variable Response Cushioning, plus an adjustable air cushioning system for a comfortable stride that reduces the chance of injury. The T-R01 is capable of reaching a top speed of 14 km/h, and features 10 levels of incline. Its intuitive console can be adjusted to the ideal angle, and has 3 crystal-clear LED windows that display your Time, Distance, Incline, Speed, Calories and Heart Rate (measured via integrated Contact Grips). Tackle 25 built-in exercise programs that cover different training methods (5 walking and jogging, 5 jogging and running, 5 jogging and hiking, 5 acceleration and 5 incline). With FeatherLight Folding, the Horizon T-R01 can be stored with the deck upright to save on floor space. Transport wheels are also built in to the frame for easy movement.

Its 1.4mm belt offers a running area of 42 x 135 cm, with the integrated IdealZone system providing variable amounts of cushioning for the right mix of comfort and shock absorption. Enjoy 4 built-in workout programs, including weight loss, leg toner and weight loss options, with your time, speed, distance, incline, calories and heart rate displayed across 3 clear LED windows. Your heart rate can be measured via the contact grips on the handlebars, with a built-in indicator letting you know when your heart rate is in an optimal zone for training. With FeatherLight Folding, the Horizon T82 features a hydraulic lift to easily raise the deck and store in a vertical position to save on floor space. Transport wheels are also built in to the frame for easy movement.

description: Power your workouts with the Horizon 7.0AT Folding Treadmill, built to deliver a responsive, flexible training experience. Whether you’re a walker or a jogger, this 20” x 60” deck provides all the space and comfort you need to run at your pace. A powerful 3.0 HP motor allows you to hit top speed of 12mph and inclines of up to 15%, both adjustable via one-touch keys. All Horizon treadmill decks are built with shock-absorbing 3-Zone Variable Response Cushioning to give you the ideal amount of flex and support in all phases of your stride. A 16 Digit Alphanumeric LED 7” LCD Screen displays your time, distance, calories, speed, incline, pace and heart rate, with 73 intuitive workout programmes to choose from. When you’ve finished your run, enjoy the convenience of a folding frame thanks to Horizon’s effortless hydraulic folding system that facilitates easy storage between workouts. Other integrated features include Bluetooth speakers, Fan, USB charging, Energy Saver Mode, Bottle Holder, Audio in/out jack and a tablet/reading rack.

description: The Life Fitness F3 is a folding treadmill that doesn't sacrifice on quality. Loaded with the highest quality components and complete with a sleek design and sturdy frame, you'll be amazed that it actually folds! Driven by a powerful and quiet 3.0 HP MagnaDrive™ motor, you can challenge your limits without distraction even when hitting the 16km/h maximum speed limit. Designed to provide comfort and support, the F3 comes complete with a patented FlexDeck® shock absorption system, which reduces impact to your joints by nearly 30%. SIMPLE NAVIGATION The Go console provides you with a very easy-to-use interface, which displays all your important training feedback. For added convenience, the lower control pad brings the buttons closer to you while the Go System™ Quick Start remembers your preferred speeds and incline positions. As a result, you can get started with the push of a button. You can also track your heart rate using either the wireless heart rate monitoring system with contact handlebar sensors. WORKOUTS The Go console includes 13 workout programmes, perfect if you want a simplified range of programmes to choose from. You also have the option to store up to 2 customised user profiles for more tailored training. The F3 is easy to store away. Simple to fold away vertically, it also includes a child-proof safety lock for added security. Also available with a Track console.

description: The Platinum Club Series Treadmill is built with the highest level of durability and innovation to deliver the ultimate home workout experience. Fitted with a club-quality Discover SE3 HD 1080p touch-screen with integrated TV, you have access to extensive entertainment options, enhanced interaction, internet and Apple Watch connectivity and much more. Driven by a powerful and quiet 4.0 HP MagnaDrive™ motor, you can train without distraction even when hitting the 19km/h top speed. And with patented FlexDeck® shock absorption, impact to your joints is reduced by 30%. With a 15% maximum incline, it can challenge every fitness level while the spacious 55 x 152cm running area provides ample room for sprinting. DISCOVER SE3 HD CONSOLE Equipped with the cutting edge Discover SE3 HD Console, the Platinum Club Series Treadmill allows you to experience advanced training options. Built with a contemporary dashboard design, you can navigate around the 21' 1080p touch screen and select your workouts and entertainment with ease. Watch your favourite TV programmes via the integrated TV, browse the internet, explore popular entertainment Apps such as Netflix™, YouTube™ and BBC®, and enjoy home screen customisation. You also have access to Lifescape™ interactive courses which allow you to take high definition hikes though famous world-wide locations. With access to the LFConnect website and app, you can personalise your workout settings, edit TV channels, personalise your home screen with photos and messages, track your workouts and more. HEART RATE MONITORING Lifepulse™ digital heart rate monitoring hand sensors are conveniently placed on the easy-grip Ergobar. Polar® telemetry (chest strap included) provides accurate, hands-free heart rate monitoring. This treadmill comes in Diamond White. Other colours available include: Black Onyx, Arctic Silver and Titanium Storm. Please note – Diamond White is a made to order colour option. Lead times of up to 12 weeks apply.

description: The Lifecycle® RS1 Recumbent is a home exercise bike built to rigorous health club quality standards. Seamlessly combining extreme durability with effective workout options, it provides a fantastic challenge to suit every fitness level delivered with total comfort. You don’t need to worry about making noise with this bike as it's exceptionally quiet and smooth all the way up to 20 levels of resistance. Thanks to its sleek, ergonomic step-through design, it offers easy exit and entry assisted further by the front assist handle. The recumbent seat with back pad keeps you in a relaxed and comfortable body position which can be tweaked to fit your exact requirements courtesy of 13 horizontal seat adjustments. GO CONSOLE FEATURES The Go Console has a highly intuitive interface making it extremely user-friendly. All your essential workout feedback including distance, speed and calories is displayed via the large LCD display and includes simple quick keys including Quick Start, Warm Up and Cool Down to make things easy. With 13 workouts including classic as well as advanced HeartSync™ programmes, you can stay constantly motivated, challenged and supported with your fitness goals. There is also the option to create 2 user profiles allowing each user to set up their workout quickly, monitor their own progress and save one custom workout each. The Life Fitness RS1 Lifecycle has contact heart rate hand sensors as well as wireless telemetry with a chest strap included. This enables you to closely monitor your heart rate while you work up a sweat. Also available with a Track+ console.

description: Discover a more relaxed cycling session with the Matrix R50 Recumbent Cycle. Its Dual Form Frame is sturdy and durable, and offers enhanced accessibility with its easy step-through design. The Exact Force induction brake system delivers 30 levels of electronic resistance, which can be easily adjusted mid-workout via resistance toggles on the seat-mounted handlebars when you want to up the challenge. Grab the handlebar’s integrated contact grips to keep track of your heart rate on the go too! The R50 features an enhanced Comfort Arc Seat, with an oversized mesh back rest that can be reclined for optimal comfort, and oversized, self-balancing pedals for a secure footing. Complete with the advanced XIR console, it’s easy to keep every workout fresh with 12 metric-driven cardio programmes like Sprint 8. You can sync to the apps you already use, like MyFitnessPal, Strava, Fitbit and more via ViewFit connectivity, and enjoy entertainment favourites including Netflix, Spotify and YouTube (subscriptions not included). Connect your console via WiFi for software updates, ViewFit, web browsing and entertainment apps. Get the most accurate heart rate feedback fitness equipment can provide with integrated Polar heart rate technology, with a Polar heart rate strap included with the XIR. Extra features include a water bottle holder, integrated reading rack and energy saver mode.

description: Ideal for those short on space, the Hybrid Trainer XT negates the need for both an elliptical and recumbent bike, combining them both on just one machine! The ProForm Hybrid Trainer boasts an impressive 16 pre-set workouts, and thanks to the 1-16 digital resistance levels, training can be as easy or as difficult as you want. The Hybrid Trainer XT features the innovative SMR™ Silent Magnetic Resistance that can be adjusted through 16 digital levels to suit each workout and has an amazing stride length of 38 cm. The high-quality system requires little to no maintenance or service and allows you to change resistance levels quicker than standard systems. Ride in comfort on the Hybrid Trainer XT, with a cushioned seat and cushioned pedals that adjust to suit any user. The large, one window display can be manoeuvred to your ideal angle for added comfort, and with the built-in watts meter, you power readout is displayed on the screen so you know when to pick up the pace, or slow it down. You can also get accurate pulse readings on the go with EKG grip pulse handlebars. The Hybrid Trainer XT is iFit® Bluetooth Smart (BLE) enabled (subscription not included), allowing you to stride or cycle around a different city with every workout using Google Maps, and provides you with access to over 1000 downloadable workouts. Make the most of the iPod compatibility as well, which enables you to listen to your favourite tunes as you work out. Other features include an integrated tablet holder (tablet not included), transport wheels and a water bottle holder.

It comes complete with an easy to read LCD screen, which feeds back time, speed, distance, calories burned and heart rate via the EKG grips. The foam covered, adjustable handlebars feature a unique table holder so you can watch indoor cycle classes, your favourite films or listen to music whilst you train. With a water bottle and holder, you can stay hydrated during the most intense workouts. The stylish and functional design features a smooth 14kg flywheel (460mm diameter) with a quick release tension adjuster, providing continuous tension. The cycle features a three-piece crank and balanced pedals with foot straps, 2 way bearing and chain driven, fully adjustable seat (adjusted both vertically and horizontally). It has a strong, robust frame with transport wheels for easy movement.

description: The IC2 Group Exercise Bike from Life Fitness is built with solid steel for strength and stability, and finished with a sleek Matte Slate colour. Its parallel frame features a 173mm Q-Factor for a real road bike feel, while full frame shrouds and guards, aluminium pin-to-lock posts and sliders, and standard bras are also incorporated into the design. The IC2 is complete with four levelling feet and two transport wheels to assist with positioning and transportation. The Poly-V Belt Drivetrain transfers torque smoothly and quietly (and requires less maintenance too), while the 1:3 Drivetrain Gear Ratio offers a front-based, 15kg aluminium flywheel. Featuring an ANT+ Computer Console, the intuitive performance measurement effectively demonstrates intensity and effort, while showing cadence, heart rate and calorie expenditure. The power supply for this feature requires batteries. Paired with the dual-sided SPD and toe caged pedals is a multi-positioned soft PVC handlebar, offering vertical adjustments. You’ll also find a unisex padded sport saddle which enables vertical and horizontal adjustments. All adjustments can be made via the dials and levers. Meanwhile, there is a single water bottle holder and a push emergency stop button situated in front of the saddle for safety.

description: Featuring a 10” interactive touchscreen display, the NordicTrack S10i Studio Cycle put personal cycling training at your fingertips. Stream high-energy studio sessions with trainers who control your bike’s decline, incline and resistance in real-time. Digital one-touch buttons let you change up your session on the fly, taking the incline up to 20% or decline to -10%. The SMR™ Silent Magnetic Resistance offers frictionless changes between the 22 digital levels, adding to the smooth cycling motion that’s a result of a heavy 13kg inertia-enhanced flywheel and durable drive system. Adjust the ergonomic padded saddle horizontally and vertically, or swap out the saddle and pedals for those on a standard bike for extra comfort. The S10i is iFIT enabled*, meaning you never have to be bored by your workout again. With studio sessions to global workouts and even cross-training options like yoga and full-body sculpting, your options are seemingly endless. Plus, you get a pair of 3lb dumbbells included with your studio cycle so you can keep your arms and shoulders as strong as your legs. Other features include an autobreeze workout fan, Bluetooth Smart (BLE) HR Receiver, water bottle holder and non-slip multi-position handlebar. *30-Day iFIT Trial Included. Credit Card required for activation. iFIT Membership auto-renews unless cancelled in advance. 30 day trial applies to new memberships only.

description: Stacked with both new and improved features, the NordicTrack S27i Studio Bike tops their line up of indoor racers. Most notable is the new 27” full colour capacitive touch display. NordicTrack’s largest bike touchscreen yet, this display offers the most impressive view yet of your global iFIT workouts. It even tilts and pivots for optimal viewing both on or off the bike, giving you a clear line of sight during strength (two 1.5kg dumbbells included), yoga or cross-training workouts. Also equipped with their most advanced sound system yet, the S27i gives you clearer audio for enhanced immersion. With a 30-day Family iFIT subscription included*, you can access global rides, streaming sessions where world-class trainers digitally adjust your incline up to 20%, decline down to -10% and resistance from your own home. Speaking of resistance, the S27i offers 24 digital levels of SMR™ Silent Magnetic Resistance, easily adjustable mis-ride thanks to quick touch controls on the handles. Combined with an inertia-enhanced flywheel, smart-response drive system and premium steel construction, the S27i delivers an unmatched experience. Enjoy a secure footing with hybrid SPD+Toe clip pedals, giving you the option to clip in with cycling shoes or ride with standard toe cages. Quickly find the best riding position for you with and adjustable saddle and handlebars with new lift assist for easy movement. Other features include dual water bottle holders, Bluetooth headphone and heart rate connectivity and an AutoBreeze™ workout fan. *30-Day iFIT Trial Included. Credit Card required for activation. iFIT Membership auto-renews unless cancelled in advance. 30 day trial applies to new memberships only.

description: With 22 levels of SMR™ Silent Magnetic Resistance, the Tour De France CSC delivers a challenge for all riders. A 10kg flywheel and quick-stop braking system ensures a smooth and frictionless and stable ride at all speeds and intensities. The TDF CSC comes Bluetooth Smart BLE enabled, and enjoys while having iFit® compatibility, which allows you to gain access to a new workout every day, automatically track your progress, replicate real-life routes with Google Maps™, (including Tour De France stages) compete with your friends, and custom-tailor your training to your specific goals (1-year iFIT Single Subscription Included). With iFit’s LIVE Resistance Control technology, your trainer takes control of the resistance on your bike to realistically match the terrain of your workout. View your workout and stats with ease on the 7” full colour touchscreen display, positioned at the perfect angle on top of the handlebars. The ergonomic padded seat is adjustable vertically and horizontally, as is the non-slip handlebar with dipped grips, meaning it’s easy to find your favourite riding position. description: Power your workouts with the Horizon 7.0AT Folding Treadmill, built to deliver a responsive, flexible training experience. Whether you’re a walker or a jogger, this 20” x 60” deck provides all the space and comfort you need to run at your pace. A powerful 3.0 HP motor allows you to hit top speed of 12mph and inclines of up to 15%, both adjustable via one-touch keys. All Horizon treadmill decks are built with shock-absorbing 3-Zone Variable Response Cushioning to give you the ideal amount of flex and support in all phases of your stride. A 16 Digit Alphanumeric LED 7” LCD Screen displays your time, distance, calories, speed, incline, pace and heart rate, with 73 intuitive workout programmes to choose from. When you’ve finished your run, enjoy the convenience of a folding frame thanks to Horizon’s effortless hydraulic folding system that facilitates easy storage between workouts. description: The Life Fitness F3 is a folding treadmill that doesn't sacrifice on quality. Loaded with the highest quality components and complete with a sleek design and sturdy frame, you'll be amazed that it actually folds! Driven by a powerful and quiet 3.0 HP MagnaDrive™ motor, you can challenge your limits without distraction even when hitting the 16km/h maximum speed limit. Designed to provide comfort and support, the F3 comes complete with a patented FlexDeck® shock absorption system, which reduces impact to your joints by nearly 30%. SIMPLE NAVIGATION The Go console provides you with a very easy-to-use interface, which displays all your important training feedback. For added convenience, the lower control pad brings the buttons closer to you while the Go System™ Quick Start remembers your preferred speeds and incline positions. As a result, you can get started with the push of a button. You can also track your heart rate using either the wireless heart rate monitoring system with contact handlebar sensors. WORKOUTS The Go console includes 13 workout programmes, perfect if you want a simplified range of programmes to choose from. You also have the option to store up to 2 customised user profiles for more tailored training. The F3 is easy to store away. Simple to fold away vertically, it also includes a child-proof safety lock for added security. Also available with a Track console.

description: The Nevada Plus G119AX from BH Fitness is a stylish, space-saving home gym. Compact in size, it offers a 73kg weight stack. A sturdy machine, the G119AX comes complete with a protective steel enclosure with high quality rigidity. The cable pulleys are robust with smooth and direct motion, and are able to withstand a maximum tension of 100kg. As the machine is completely encased, you have greater protection and safety when training. Thanks to the oversized seat pads, you can train for longer periods in absolute comfort. The machine offers 14 exercises for the upper body, plus leg extension. The machine features an exercise guide on the side. The seat can be folded to save space.

title: BH Fitness G152X Global Gym Plus with Leg Press
description: Part of BH Fitness’s Global Gym Series, the Global Gym Plus G152X is a complete home gym, bringing you everything you need for versatile, total-body workouts. Conveniently presented in a neat, all-in-one package, this impressive gym features a multi-station - 73kg weight stack - with seated leg press and a power tower for working those upper muscles plus your core/abs. You can move seamlessly between exercises and get more done in less time. A sturdy machine, the G152X boasts a protective steel enclosure with excellent rigidity, while specially designed cable pulleys are able to withstand a maximum tension of 100kg. As the machine is completely encased, you have greater protection and safety when training. Made for comfort, oversized seat pads ensure you can train for as long as you want and the leg press can be adjusted easily for a custom fit. The machine features an exercise guide on the side. You can complete a wide range of exercises, including: Lat Down, Butterfly, Leg Extension, Leg Abductor, Leg Adductor, Abdominal Crunch and more, and work the triceps, shoulders, glutes, abs and leg muscles in a variety of ways

title: Body-Solid G3S Performance Trainer Gym
description: Straight Forward Design, Advanced Engineering. Advanced engineering has resulted in exceptional range of motion and full adjustability for any size user. The multi-grip press arm system delivers deep and effective muscle interaction for chest, incline and shoulder press movements. No need to sit on the floor to perform rowing exercises with the G3S, simply grasp the mid row handles for an exhilarating mid and lower back workout that will increase your flexibility, build strength and relieve lower back stress. Switch between high, mid and low pulley exercises quickly and easily with the G3S' no cable change design. Perform lat pulldowns, triceps pressdowns, biceps curls, resistance ab crunches and dozens more exercises with the included cable attachments. The Leg Extension / Leg Curl Station is fully adjustable to comfortably fit any size user and features thick foam rollers for maximum comfort. a and the optional Leg Press / Calf Press Attachment for the ultimate lower body workout with up to 420 lbs. of resistance. The G3S is a total body fitness machine that is built to last and bring you a LIFETIME of effective workouts...guaranteed. All the outstanding features that define a Body-Solid home gym are right here. The heavy-duty steel mainframe with all-4-side welded construction, fibreglass-reinforced nylon pulleys and aircraft-quality cable make this machine a top performer that is guaranteed for life. In-Home Lifetime Warranty On Everything.

title: Body-Solid GEXM2000 Multigym
description: Featuring a simple, space-saving design that doesn't compromise on good looks or performance, the Body-Solid GEXM2000 Multi-Gym delivers exceptional training in its all-in-one machine. Packed into a concise 4 x 5 foot space, it fits comfortably into most rooms while the 210lbs weight stack, shrouded for maximum safety, guarantees workouts to take your performance to new heights. Delivering on comfort, the GEXM2000 features an adjustable seat and back pad, allowing you to tweak for a custom fit. The weight selector pin is within easy reach too so you can pick your desired weight with minimum fuss. The bench press arms are also fully adjustable to ensure you get the exact right positioning for you. There are dozens of exercises to be performed on this multi-gym. Designed with free weights in mind, flys have never been more precise. Reach up for the Ab Strap, pull it over your shoulders and crunch your way to impeccable abs, or wrap your legs around the oversized foam rollers of the Leg Extension / Leg Curl and blast those quads. Spin around, reach up and take hold of the Lat Bar and perform a set of Lat-blasting pull downs. Other exercises include seated rows, triceps press downs, arm curls, leg curls, bent over rows, inner / outer thighs and many more.

title: Body-Solid Functional Training Centre
description: Body-Solid Functional Training Center With the GDCC200, life imitates state-of-the-art in a new space-saving design! Define the motions that are right for you and your individual workout goals with the Body-Solid GDCC200 Functional Training Center. This dual independent weight stack system provides dedicated resistance with true isolateral movements. Core stability training can lead to improved balance, coordination and stability. By efficiently working your body's stabilizer muscles though a limitless number of exercises, the GDCCC200 Functional Training Center offers strength-building results to users of all sizes. Unrestricted multiple planes of motion approximate the muscle activity required for many of the activities you do in everyday life. The Body-Solid GDCC200 features ergonomically designed adjustments and interchangeable cable handles engineered to put hundreds of strength-building exercises within your grasp. With a space-saving footprint, dual independent weight stacks, user-friendly ergonomics and adjustability and precision-fitted components, the GDCC200 Functional Training Center isolates an unbeatable value in today's advanced fitness market. From cable crossovers and shoulder presses to pull-ups, leg kickbacks and everything in between, make a motion to improve your core, build your strength and increase your endurance with the Body-Solid GDCC200. Body-Solid Functional Training Center Body-Solid is recognized worldwide as a leader in home gyms and commercial strength training equipment. Over 5 million customers are enjoying the results of strength training in their everyday lives. Our equipment is designed to fit a wide variety of lifestyles, space requirements and user sizes. The Body-Solid GDCC200 Functional Training Center puts core stability within your grasp by offering a limitless variety of balance-improving, coordination-enhancing, user-defined workout regimens. Vertical carriage system features fiberglass reinforced nylon pulleys and locking, universal attachment connections. Precision-fitted frame components constructed from commercial grade 11-gauge, 2' x 4' oval tubing with an electrostatically applied powder coat finish. 4.8mm diameter spun steel aircraft cables rated to over 2,500 lbs. 20 independent height adjustments and 180º cable positioning for frictionless resistance in all directions. Includes two 160 lb. weight stacks. High-density foam rubber handgrips and handles. High-density, injected molded end and foot caps. Includes dual position pull-up bar. Optional 50lb upgrade. Built and guaranteed with Body-Solid quality that will last a lifetime. Images for illustration purposes

description: We’ve paired the outstanding Body-Solid G6B Bi-Angular Gym with the optional Inner/Outer Thigh Station Attachment to bring even more exercise options and maximise your home strength training. Featuring a compact, space-saving footprint, the G6B Bi-Angular Gym offers an incredible 6 stations with 210lbs weight stack and 50+ exercises to target all six major muscle groups. Safe and comfortable, the G6B comes with lumbar support pads, adjustable seat and DuraFirm™ upholstery, which offers exceptional comfort throughout every exercise. The integrated leg developer CAM prevents resistance drop-off at the end of the exercise movement and provides consistent resistance throughout the full range of motion. Key stations included with this stellar home gym are the Bi-Angular Motion Chest Press, ideal for chest presses, incline presses and shoulder presses, the Lat Pulldown/ High Pulley for lat pull downs, triceps press downs, cable crossovers and more, the Seated Row / Low Pulley for building depth in the middle back and strengthening lower lats, Leg Extension / Leg Curl for leg curls and leg extensions and the Ab Crunch / Mid Pulley for developing incredible abs and triceps in quick-speed time. Also included is the outstanding Perfect Pec Station. Equipped with variable resistance, swivel arms and designed for both unilateral and bilateral movements, it provides you with maximum stretch for deep muscle toning and the most incredible upper body development you can get. The included Inner/Outer Thigh Station enables you to effectively tone the notoriously hard to target inner and outer thighs. You can perform both the abductor and adductor from a seated position, adjusting your workout via the 5 range-of-motion adjustments. It comes complete with lumbar supported adjustable back pad and swiveling knee pads

The adjustable, 6-position, ergonomic seat allows you to find your perfect position and offers smooth motion, while the 2:1 ratio provides 400lbs of weight resistance.

title: Body-Solid Club Line Full Commercial Leverage Seated Row
description: Body-Solid Functional Training Center With the GDCC200, life imitates state-of-the-art in a new space-saving design! Define the motions that are right for you and your individual workout goals with the Body-Solid GDCC200 Functional Training Center. This dual independent weight stack system provides dedicated resistance with true isolateral movements. Core stability training can lead to improved balance, coordination and stability. By efficiently working your body's stabilizer muscles though a limitless number of exercises, the GDCCC200 Functional Training Center offers strength-building results to users of all sizes. Unrestricted multiple planes of motion approximate the muscle activity required for many of the activities you do in everyday life. The Body-Solid GDCC200 features ergonomically designed adjustments and interchangeable cable handles engineered to put hundreds of strength-building exercises within your grasp. With a space-saving footprint, dual independent weight stacks, user-friendly ergonomics and adjustability and precision-fitted components, the GDCC200 Functional Training Center isolates an unbeatable value in today's advanced fitness market. From cable crossovers and shoulder presses to pull-ups, leg kickbacks and everything in between, make a motion to improve your core, build your strength and increase your endurance with the Body-Solid GDCC200. Body-Solid Functional Training Center Body-Solid is recognized worldwide as a leader in home gyms and commercial strength training equipment. Over 5 million customers are enjoying the results of strength training in their everyday lives. Our equipment is designed to fit a wide variety of lifestyles, space requirements and user sizes. The Body-Solid GDCC200 Functional Training Center puts core stability within your grasp by offering a limitless variety of balance-improving, coordination-enhancing, user-defined workout regimens. Vertical carriage system features fiberglass reinforced nylon pulleys and locking, universal attachment connections. Precision-fitted frame components constructed from commercial grade 11-gauge, 2' x 4' oval tubing with an electrostatically applied powder coat finish. 4.8mm diameter spun steel aircraft cables rated to over 2,500 lbs. 20 independent height adjustments and 180º cable positioning for frictionless resistance in all directions. Includes two 160 lb. weight stacks. High-density foam rubber handgrips and handles. High-density, injected molded end and foot caps. Includes dual position pull-up bar. Optional 50lb upgrade. Built and guaranteed with Body-Solid quality that will last a lifetime. Images for illustration purposes

title: Hammer Strength Select SE Full Seated Row
description: Part of the full commercial Select SE series, the Hammer Strength Select SE Full Seated Row brings superior build and high performance to every fitness environment. An advanced Seated Row machine, it features the highest quality components including an 11-gauge steel frame, sturdy steel tubing and lubricated cables for smooth performance. With multiple hand positions, it enables a variety of mid and upper back exercises. The solid weight plates are neatly positioned in a secure weight stack, easily adjusted from lighter resistance all the way up to 138kg. Designed for the toughest of commercial environments, the Seated Row boasts robust stabilising rubber feet, smooth lubricated cables made to U.S. Military specifications and durable hand grips with aluminium collars to prevent slipping. A focus on comfort, the cushioning features radius on edge moulding for comfy positioning while stitching eliminates folds in the material to increase durability. The machine also features an overhead pivot that creates a natural arc of motion for safe, efficient exercises. The weight selector pin magnetically locks in place and is connected to the stack so won’t get misplaced. Choose from a wide range of frame and upholstery colours for a custom model.

title: Hammer Strength Select SE Full Back Extension
description: Part of the heavy-duty Select series, the Hammer Strength Select SE Back Extension offers the comfort and simplicity ideal for novice weight trainers whilst its durability makes it tough enough for the seasoned campaigner. Boasting sturdy steel tubing, precision welds and internally lubricated cables, it delivers exceptional precision for maximised weight training. The frame is constructed of 11-gauge steel with an electrostatic powder coat finish to ensure maximum protection. Solid rubber feet prevent slipping while the U.S. Military standard cables come with lubricated, nylon coating. Stitching on the cushioning eliminates folds in the material for ultimate robustness and radius on edge moulding ensures extra comfort. The 138kg/295lb weight stack featuring solid steel plates offers plenty of resistance, which is easily tweaked via the conveniently placed incremental weight system. For safety, the 7/1' (11mm) diameter weight selector pin magnetically locks in place and is connected to the stack to prevent loss while the top weight plate is fitted with self-lubricating bushings. Five starting positions and two non-slip foot positions cater to different users while the lumbar pad helps you find the correct position with ease. A joy to train on, streamlined adjustments keep training simple so you can train alone without a spotter. Choose from a wide range of frame and upholstery colours for a custom model.

title: NordicTrack RW300 Rowing Machine
description: Whisper-quiet, the NordicTrack RW300 Rowing Machines SMR Silent Magnetic Resistance delivers 24 levels of resistance for a challenging home workout. It features oversized, pivoting pedals and adjustable foot straps for secure and comfortable positioning throughout every stroke. A 5” high contrast multi-colour display provides your important workout feedback, and can be adjusted to your ideal viewing angle. Mount your device to the tablet holder above the console to follow along with classes and workouts, or keep up to date with your favourite shows while you row (tablet not included). If working your way through 20 pre-set workout wasn’t enough, the 750R is iFIT enabled. Monitoring your nutrition, exercise, sleep and activity, iFIT creates a personalized daily programme to maximise your training and health. Experience individualised, virtual workouts led by the world’s best trainers in the comfort of your own home (30 Day iFIT Family Subscription Included*). When you’ve finished your rowing workout, the NordicTrack RW300 Rowing Machine can fold up and wheel away for easy space-saving storage.

title: NordicTrack RW600 Rowing Machine
description: Row smarter with the NordicTrack RW600 Rower. Two forms of resistance – digital (managed by the elite iFit trainers) and manual – provide 26 challenging levels to work through as you progress. Over-sized, pivoting pedals with quick-release adjustable foot straps offer the stability you need to focus only on your intense trainer-led workouts, with the ergonomic moulded seat and Soft Touch™ handle providing that extra level of comfort. Connect your rower to iFit (30 Day iFIT Family Subscription included*), and enjoy high-energy rowing classes led by world class personal trainers, streamed directly to the 10” Smart HD Touchscreen. With studio rowing sessions to global rowing workouts, complete with off-machine options like yoga and mindfulness and strength training, iFit provides all the training variety you need. You’ll get access to in-depth workout stats that let you know how effective your sessions are, and what you can do to improve, and with the new Bluetooth Headphone Connectivity, you can sync your favourite headphones to your machine to listen to your trainer or music undistracted. The RW600 features NordicTrack’s innovative SpaceSaver technology, folding vertically for easy storage and transport. *30-Day iFIT Trial Included. Credit Card required for activation. iFIT Membership auto-renews unless cancelled in advance. 30 day trial applies to new memberships only.

title: Life Fitness Heat Rowing Machine LCD
description: Life Fitness pushed the envelope to create a streamlined rower that helps exercisers to push past their limits. Designed with a combined Air and Magnetic resistance system, the Heat Row provides 100 resistance levels, adjustable via a 300° resistance dial that allow exercises to fine tune their workouts to any level of intensity. The intuitive LCD console allows instructors to optimise small group training and enables exercises to easily train on their own with simple programs including target workouts, distance, time, calories, and intervals. This easy-to-use digital console boots up into Quick Start mode, giving exercisers the ability to start their workout quickly and without interruption. Crafted with the exerciser in mind, the Heat Row boasts a host of smart design touches for an enjoyable training experience. A mobile phone holder is included above the LCD screen to stay connected through your workout, and the embedded roller guide system and quick-release ratcheting foot strap keep you firmly planted and stable as you row. The Heat Row is easy to transport too, with a concealed handle inside the end cap and front transport wheels.

title: Life Fitness Heat Rowing Machine LCD
description: The powerfully designed Heat Performance Row challenges users with a focus on high-intensity athletic training that surpasses standard cardio workouts. Built with a combines Air and Magnetic resistance system, the Heat Performance Row provides 100 resistance levels, adjustable via a 300° resistance dial that allow exercisers to fine tune their workouts to any level of intensity. The Heat Performance Row’s TFT console provides accurate feedback that’s specific to each user. With the Race a Distance or Race a Friend programs, or through innovative Coach by Color® technology, it’s easy for users to see and be informed of their output during workouts in a fun and engaging way. Other built in workout programs include Quick Start, Power Training, Heart Rate Training and Interval Training. The Heat Performance Row is no exception to Life Fitness’ history of smart designs. Control buttons on the ergonomic handlebar allow he exerciser to toggle between Training, Comparative and Technique console views quickly, and quick-release ratchet foot straps make for easy entry and exit. An embedded roller guide system ensures a smooth rowing motion, with a transport handle hidden inside the endcap and front transport wheels for easy movement.

title: Body-Solid R300 Endurance Light Commercial Air Rowing Machine
description: When it comes to toning the leg muscles, it takes a little more focus. The Insignia Series Leg Curl is the ideal strength training machine to help effectively shape, carve and define those key leg muscles including the hamstrings, calves plus the glutes. Beautifully crafted with clean lines and subtle, rounded tubing, the full commercial Insignia Leg Curl stands out in any fitness environment, whether that be the gym floor, a fitness suite or a dedicated home work out space. Designed to easily accommodate the rigours of a full commercial gym, the Insignia range is built to last. Outstanding construction with optimised biomechanics, the Leg Curl is solid, durable and offers natural, fluid movement. This is achieved through its independent motion. A comfortable training station, the diverging hip and chest pad angles decrease lower back stress, whilst also ensuring correct body alignment. Boasting quality, padded upholstery, this is comfortable yet incredibly durable providing an excellent base to encourage maximum potential. Featuring an 85kg weight stack, this solid machine accommodates every user and offers the ability to progress through the resistance. Thanks to its handy incremental weight stack and large diameter ergonomic rubber dial, switching intensity couldn’t be easier. With ease of use in mind, the machine features simple, one handed push button adjustments. Other customisation comes courtesy of the 8 start positions, adjustable roller pad with 4 options – S, M, L and XL – and an articulating seat, also easily adjusted with the lightweight assist. The Leg Curl also features a convenient electronic reps counter and timer. This is a custom designed product. Featuring a 168kg weight stack, this stellar machine is ideal for every user, from the beginner to the fully fledged strength training veteran. Thanks to its handy incremental weight stack and large diameter ergonomic rubber dial, switching intensity couldn’t be easier, providing a challenge for everyone. Safe and effective, the optimised biomechanics of the Insignia series uses independent motion to maintain equilateral muscle development. Every movement is well supported, fluid and incredibly natural, resulting in maximised performance potential. The Calf Extension offers the very best in comfort. It features superior upholstery and excellent custom features which include the articulating seat, which can be adjusted single-handedly at an angle via the simple lightweight assist. The supportive footplate delivers a natural arc of motion, which ensures correct form and encourages multiple repetitions. With a handy electronic reps counter and timer, the machine takes care of keeping track of your reps for you too! This is a custom designed product. title: Life Fitness Row GX Rowing Machine
description: The full commercial Life Fitness Row GX Rowing Machine merges durability, comfort and quality design to deliver an exceptionally high performance rowing experience. Designed with fluid technology resistance, the Row GX uses water to power the resistance. This offers incredibly natural motion, simulating the sound and feel of a real rowing experience, whilst engaging the whole body. With 16 resistance levels, it can challenge very user, from the newbie to the seasoned campaigner. The simple to use console shows all your key workout stats including time, distance and strokes per minute and the ergonomic handle guarantees reduced strain on the arms and wrists. A stand out performer on both the gym floor and in the home, it boasts attractive, stylish design as well as a conveniently small footprint of under 77' in length. Taking up less space, it's great for smaller spaces at home, or in a busy gym where you may want multiple rowers for engaging group sessions. Plus, complete with vertical storage and transport wheels, it's easy to move around your facility or home and keep out of the way when not in use.

title: WaterRower A1 Series Rowing Machine
description: The entry-level model in the WaterRower® range, the WaterRower® A1 rowing machine is lightweight and portable, originally designed for use in indoor rowing group classes. The A1 is handcrafted, combining the stylish aesthetic of a hybrid solid oak and aluminium frame with commercial-grade durability. It can even be stored vertically when not in use – three A1s stood together only take up the same amount of floor space as one standard indoor bike. Fitted with a WaterFlywheel, the A1 is unique in its replication of on-water rowing. Unlike traditional air or magnetic rowing machines, the WaterRower® A1 has a smooth stroke with no dead spots, placing minimal strain on joints and the lower back. The A1’s comfortable positioning and geometry make it easy to row with good form, using every large muscle group for an effective cardio workout. Equipped with the A1 Quick-Start LCD monitor, it’s easy to keep track of your performance as you row. The monitor displays your basic rowing metrics like distance, 500m split time and calories, and is embedded in the footboard for an uninterrupted stroke. Other integrated features include transport wheels for easy movement and adjustable footplates. WaterRower® is a registered trade mark of WaterRower (UK) Ltd and its affiliates.

title: FluidRower Neon Plus Fluid Rowing Machine
description: Designed for progressive training, NEON’s twin tank facilitates speed and endurance training allowing the user to find a level of Fluid Force that’s challenging. Engaging the upper and lower core muscles simultaneously, the NEON will inspire you to train harder and fire up and unbeatable rowing technique. Four levels of Fluid Force move resistance from feather-light to Olympic Sprint at the turn of a dial, with the unique triple bladed impeller and baffled tank internals delivering instant catch and consistent resistance throughout the whole stroke. Complete with a multilevel monitor, with additional USB port, you can view time, distance, 500m split time, strokes per minute, calories per hour, watts and heart rate. Key comfort features come in the form of a contoured seat with textured finish to prevent slipping, that delivers a silent, smooth action. An ergonomic handle minimises strain on hands, wrists and forearms, and height-adjustable footplates ensure optimal foot placement and a comfortable rowing position. Boasting a compact footprint, the NEON can be stored vertically, and easily moved thanks to built-in transport wheels.

title: NordicTrack NEW RW700 Rowing Machine
description: The NordicTrack RW700 Rower, provides the most fluid rowing experience yet. NordicTrack have worked hard on some new features including the new 10” ‘Tilt and Pivot’ HD touchscreen and premium 30W audio. In addition to the inertia-enhanced flywheel design paired with the new slide system to ensure buttery smooth silenced movement. NordicTrack have provided a workout with comfort in mind with the new RW700. Both the seat and SoftTouch™ Handle boast an ergonomic design, accompanied by the oversized pivoting pedals and their adjustable foot straps. You are guaranteed a comfy workout. More so, the auto-adjust resistance mechanism allows for the easiest of exercises. You can follow on-demand training sessions without any difficulty. The rower will make a sleek yet robust addition to any gym environment. With studio rowing sessions to global rowing workouts, complete with off-machine options like yoga and mindfulness and strength training, iFit provides all the training variety you need (30-day subscription included*). *30-Day iFIT Trial Included. Credit Card required for activation. iFIT Membership auto-renews unless cancelled in advance. 30 day trial applies to new memberships only.

title: NordicTrack RW900 Rowing Machine
description: The Body Solid Pro-Select Leg Extension/Curl Machine provides excellent versatility. Seamlessly combining quality and comfort, you can perform the two most important leg exercises from a single, comfortable position with a maximum weight load of 210lbs (95kgs). This durable machine comes with DuraFirm™ pads and oversized rollers for maximum comfort. Fully adjustable, the 7 gauge steel cam maximises your range of motion capabilities. The back pad and leg hold down can also be adjusted by 7 positions so you can customise to fit you perfectly. Thanks to its simple pull-pin design, adjusting between the leg extension and leg curl is made easy. Fitted with a biochemically correct seat angle, it provides proper support and isolation of the muscle group. You can strengthen your quadriceps muscles with the leg extension exercise while the leg curl works your glutes and hamstring muscles. As a result, you remain comfortable and correctly positioned to achieve maximum results. Ideal for home and light commercial use. Available with a 310lbs stack upgrade. WARRANTY Home: Lifetime parts warranty Light commercial: Lifetime on frame, 2 years on pulleys, bushing, bearings and hardware, 1 year on cables, upholstery, grips and other components.

title: ProForm 440R Rowing Machine
description: Ready to push you to a new definition of fit, the 440R combines both your cardio and strength training with the low pulley station and rower. The inertia enhanced flywheel offers a smooth rowing motion, while 8 levels of adjustable resistance ensure your workout remains a challenge. It’s easy to get comfortable on the 440R! Built with lightweight, durable material, it features an oversized aluminium seat rail and an adjustable ergonomic moulded seat. Pivoting pedals are designed to keep your feet securely in place, and include adjustable straps that increase stability when rowing. Or, stand in front of the machine and use the soft-touch handle to perform a number of strength exercises. The large one window console displays all your necessary workout feedback, including strokes per minute, total strokes, time, distance and calories. Fitted wheels make it easy to move the machine from place to place, and its space-saving design means it can be easily stored away.

title: NordicTrack FS14i FreeStride Trainer
description: A 3-in-1 total-body training machine, the NordicTrack FS14i FreeStride Trainer combines the motion, versatility and benefits of a stepper, elliptical and treadmill for an incredible home workout. Built with a 9kg effective, inertia-enhanced flywheel and 26 levels of SMR™ Silent Magnetic Resistance, the FS14i is smooth in motion. The machine will intuitively follow your movements as you adjust your stride from 0” to 32” (81cm) to transform your workout. Complete with a free 30-day iFit Family membership*, FS14i users can work out with the most incredible hand-selected trainers from all over the world. Helping you reach your goals, these trainers will offer step-by-step guidance throughout your journey, adjusting your machine’s settings for you in real time, including decline/incline from -10° to 10°. Powered by Google Maps™, and with Street View right on your 14” touchscreen console, you can virtually travel to gorgeous, exotic location at the touch of a button. Or, delve into a virtual studio setting to push yourself alongside your instructor. Comfort features come in the shape of an integrated AutoBreeze™ workout fan to keep you cool, SoftTouch™ upper body grips and oversized cushion pedals. Other integrated features include transport wheels, a water bottle holder and dual Bluetooth 2” speakers. *30-Day iFIT Trial Included. Credit Card required for activation. iFIT Membership auto-renews unless cancelled in advance. 30 day trial applies to new memberships only.

title: Life Fitness Elevation Discover ST Powermill WIFI
description: Driven by 4.0hp motor, the SureStep System Technology within the Powermill provides 26 speeds ranging from 12-185 steps per minute. Step with space on the Powermill, with large steps built with anti-toe pinch for secure footing at any speed. You will feel confident in your stride with the smooth motion of the Powermill Climber. This machine also features support handlebars, and integrated accessory tray and thumb controls to ensure you are able to hold on and place your belongings exactly where you feel comfortable. Complete with the Discover ST console, the integrated HD TV and intuitive touchscreen offers a straight forward and engaging entertainment experience to exercisers. NFC and Bluetooth® compatible, the Discover ST console includes beautiful interactive terrain courses and up to 25 workouts. The frame itself boasts an excellent way access design for maintenance and servicing, allowing you to keep your Powermill lasting for as long as possible alongside robust paint and rear wheels for easy mobility. This Powermill comes in Arctic Silver. Other colours available include Onyx Black, Diamond White and Titanium Storm.

title: Life Fitness Integrity S-SL Powermill WIFI
description: Driven by a 4.0hp motor, the SureStep System Technology within the Powermill provides 25 speeds ranging from 12-185 steps per minute. With Wi-Fi, BLE, Bluetooth® Classic, ANT+ and NFC connectivity options, the SL console is versatile enough for all exercisers and their devices. There’s even an optional attachable TV (sold separately), with 3.5mm headphone port built in!

title: Matrix Fitness Climbmill with XR Console
description: Specifically designed for home gyms, the Matrix C50 ClimbMill fits neatly in workout spaces with ceilings lower than commercial fitness facilities. The lowest step locks to a height of 26.7 cm / 10.5”, making it easier than ever to start your workout and step off when you’re done. An Exact Force Induction Brake System offers smooth, precise changes through the 24 electronic levels at the push of a button, and is quieter than standard systems thanks to no moving parts. The ClimbMill features Matrix’s exclusive Sweat Management System, that tracks sweat away from the machine’s critical components during those intense workouts, prolonging the life of the equipment. Rest assured that you’re stepping in safety with Matrix’s suite of safeguards. These include an infrared sensor, auto-pause control zone, reversible steps and emergency stop buttons, creating one of the most secure stair-climbing experiences available. Complete with the XR console, you can view all your workout stats with ease on the bright 8.5” LCD display. Track your time elapsed, time remaining, calories, watts, SPM, stairs, heart rate (chest strap not included), METS, resistance level and height, and tackle 5 workouts, including manual, fat burn, intervals, landmarks and target heart rate. Extra features include a water bottle holder, integrated reading rack, energy saver mode, internal USB port for software updates and multi-position handlebars.

title: Matrix Fitness Performance ClimbMill with LED Console
description: Give your members a reliable stair-climbing workout with equipment they can trust, with the Performance Series ClimbMill from Matrix. It features an exclusive Sweat Management system that tracks sweat away from the user and critical components, collecting it in a hidden tray and extending the life of your ClimbMill. Driven by a motorcycle-grade chain and oil-free ECB modular system, the ClimbMill delivers powerful performance that’s both low-maintenance and quiet. The lowest step locks to a height of 25.4 cm / 10”, with a step-up platform making climbing workouts more accessible than ever for everyone. Additional safety comes in the form of Matrix’s Control Drive and their exclusive Control Zone sensor – two reliable methods for instantly stopping the step rotation that exceed industry standards for safety requirements. The LED console’s simple navigation means virtually anyone can step up to the machine and get going almost instantly. The large number display and message centre provides clear, easy-to-read workout feedback that keeps members on track for their goals. Every workout is a seamless and smooth experience, with convenience features like an optional RFID login, a headphone jack, USB port and a reading rack for personal devices. Workouts include Go, Manual, Interval Training, Fat Burn, Rolling Hills, Target Heart Rate, Glute Training* and Fitness Tests. *programmes subject to change. description: Manufactured in the UK, these durable floor tile external corners are made from recycled truck tyres and offer superior protection for your flooring against cardio and strength equipment. They have two sloped sides, and are designed to fit seamlessly as the outer corner of your training area to reduce the risk of trips.
